title: Update useActor hook to prepare telemetry actor state

requirements.summary: Update React import statement in useActor.ts to include useState
acceptanceCriteria: The import statement at the top of useActor.ts includes both useEffect and useState

file_operations.description: Update the React import statement at the top of the file to include useState alongside useEffect: import { useEffect, useState } from 'react';

requirements.summary: Add telemetryActor state variable in useActor function
acceptanceCriteria: The telemetryActor state variable is declared immediately after the queryClient declaration
The state is initialized to null with type annotation <any>

file_operations.description: Inside the useActor function, immediately below the queryClient declaration, add a new state variable: const [telemetryActor, setTelemetryActor] = useState<any>(null);

requirements.summary: Update return statement to include telemetryActor and isFetching properties
acceptanceCriteria: The return statement includes all three properties: actor, telemetryActor, and isFetching
The actor property uses the existing actorQuery.data with null fallback
The telemetryActor property is included in the return object

file_operations.description: Update the return statement at the very bottom of the useActor function to return three properties: return { actor: actorQuery.data || null, telemetryActor, isFetching: actorQuery.isFetching };
